text: Sang Chul Lee (February 29, 1924 - January 28, 2017) was a Canadian Christian minister. He served as 32nd Moderator of the United Church of Canada from 1988 to 1990. He was born in Siberia, the son of Korean parents. He was married and had three daughters. Lee died on January 28, 2017 in Newmarket, Ontario at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Canadian Christians Category:Christian ministers
title: Sang Chul Lee
